text:
Today marks 1 year since @EU_Commission launched the 1st call to fund collaborative research for #diagnostics #treatment & #vaccine. Same day @WHO declared the #COVID19 #pandemic a #publichealth emergency of international concern.
Since then €780 million mobilised of €1B pledge https://t.co/8MjT2yzA9h https://t.co/6TpAnRGBDS
